website_summaries.verdict: Good design and sturdy build make this a convenient changing station that will last.
pros: Two liner dispensers mean you'll be changing dispensers less often
Bag hooks conveniently located on the corners
Pneumatic shocks provide easy one-handed open and close

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Would be nice if the included a few plastic liners as a starter kit. The orderable package contains 500, which is very much too much for our needs. I gather from various mothers that almost everyone carries a changing pad with them and would not use the disposable liners, even if they were available. Perhaps a future redesign could make the liner holder removable (if not wanted), allowing more elbow room when the changing station is open.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my work. I work for a Chiropractic office and we just moved to a larger office. This has been great the past 2 weeks. We had the construction crew install this item so I am not positive on how difficult it is for the average person but they installed really quickly. With a 2 year old son I have used a lot of changing tables and this one is a nice one. It folds down easily and returns back to place without falling on its own. If we choose to make both of our bathrooms family rooms we would buy this Continental White changing table again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this changing table for our Chruch bathroom. Great product and easy install. Installed on concrete block. The only thing I could suggest to them is to include two more of the flip out anchors for the block. Only two were sent and needed a total of four to mount in the block. I had two of the anchors and bolts that I needed in my shop so not a big deal but if you didnt have them you would have to purchase them. Overall a great product for the price and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: JayM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product. It is attractive and sleek. I gave it four instead of five stars for the following reasons: 1) Not enough anchors, only two come when there are six holes, 2) the anchors straps break easily, and caused me to loose the anchor behind the wall, 3) It comes with a plaque to indicate that there's a changing station, but the light green color makes it a bit difficult to see in muted lighting, and 4) being that it is for such delicate use, it should come with a poster with cautions, and not place on the customer the burden to choose what's appropriate to relate.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gargost

customer_reviews.title: Great Price point, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to other sites. The directions were ok to follow, loved that it did come with the wall anchors, we did add extra support with our own wall anchors just in case. Product is sturdy, easy to clean, the only thing we were confused about, were the directions on where to hang it. We measured what it said and it was super low, I don't know how they came up with that.
customer_reviews.author: HKERNES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space.  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my preschool/daycare center. I put it on a wall that had studs strangely placed within the wall, so I had to use the anchors as well as the studs. I was able to hang it with no problem. Honestly, the toughest part is having it stay open while you put it up. It would be helpful to have someone spot you until you can get the first screw or two in.
customer_reviews.author: SteveJM35

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find it in Kuwait . I bought it from her and delivered within one week. really love it. much better than any changing table . good quality as expected.easy to hang. nice color. I closed the two holes with tape because my suns hand usually stuck in.
customer_reviews.author: noura

customer_reviews.title: Works well, nice neutral color
customer_reviews.text: We've used this in our store for several years now and it is well appreciated. Works well and has handy hooks for hanging bags and so on. It's nice to be able to offer parents this service and customers appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: Ten Thousand Villages Goshen

customer_reviews.title: Worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Quality item, easy to install. Looks a little different than the usual models. Color is nice. We've installed two of these in the bathrooms of our cafe and they look good & work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, basic, changing station
customer_reviews.text: This is seeing heavy use in a church bathroom and it's holding up well. As long as you properly mount this to studs, this is a very sturdy changing station that should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Snow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We bought a few of these for a few different locations in our church. They seem very sturdy and will do the job. They were a bit smaller than I anticipated (I should have looked at the size specs closer). They don't have quite the same visual appeal that the Koala Care brand has, but they are neat and an improvement to what we had before.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit for our office building bathroom. Easy to mount but advise measuring some other installed ones before mounting. Sometimes what looks right seems off some when its done. Good solid unit for public use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: missing door plaque
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our church. Station will meet our needs but the sign to put on the door was missing.
customer_reviews.author: David Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These were installed in the restrooms of our church. They are really easy to install and even easier to use. The mothers just lay a little blanket on top. Plus, the belt prevents any rolling or standing, avoiding accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Porras F.

customer_reviews.title: holding up well so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install/replace existing changing station at our church - it gets used a lot (hence even the koala one partially breaking after about ten years).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it!! Comes in handy at the school I work since we can use it for our kiddos with special needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great is very sturdy and is not gigantic for the space. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Good product, incorrect description!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the description says that it has a 250lb weight limit, but in reality it's only rated to 50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Great option for small spaces. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Install went easy. One trick to finding the studs is to use a small magnet to find the nails that are supporting the wall. So far it seems durable and looks good in our office's small bathroom. Price is good compared to other commercial​ tables.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Changing Station
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for our church restrooms. Easily installed, excellent quality, and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mompreneur Maven

customer_reviews.title: AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: NICE PURCHASE MOUNTING HARDWARE WORKED GREAT, GOOD PRODUCT AND DIDNT HAVE TO SPEND THE PREMIUM $$$ BOUGHT TO FOR MY RESTROOMS AND WAS VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for a quick change, though the table space is small.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: review of changing table
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend tis product to any who is trying to save space in their infant room. I should have replaced my changing table with the changing station 14 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: great price, design and with microbicide in the
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again this model, great price, design and with microbicide in the plastic
customer_reviews.author: josefina garza reyna

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both boxes were missing some parts and I had to go buy them at the hardware store:(
customer_reviews.author: Ed V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well. We bought it for our church bathroom,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everthing well on the order. Just the one I ask for. Delivery on tiime.
customer_reviews.author: René Temple

product_meta.title: Continental 8252-H White Horizontal Baby Changing Station
product_meta.description:
The Continental 8252-H horizontal diaper changing station supports up to 250 lb. in a concave shelf with safety straps, measures 4 x 34-1/4 x 18 inches (H x W x D) when open, and is made of high-density polyethylene to inhibit bacterial growth. (H is height, the vertical distance from lowest to highest point; W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right; D is depth, the horizontal distance from front to back.) When closed, the changing station measures 4 inches (D). Molded-in dual liner dispensers hold approximately 50 liners for protection. The diaper changing station can attach to standard 16” on-center studs, or to a hollow wall. (Mounting hardware is included.) The unit includes a self-adhesive aluminum placard for the restroom door to identify the changing station’s location. The changing station complies with the American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM) F2285 - 04(2010) standard for diaper changing tables in commercial facilities, and American National Standards Institute (ANSI) Z535.3 and ANSI Z535.4 standards for safety signs, symbols, and labels. The unit complies with the Americans with Disabilities (ADA) act when properly installed. Continental horizontal diaper changing stations are generally used in a commercial environment. 

 Continental manufactures plastic and metal products such as restroom supplies, buckets, refuse containers, carts, and trigger sprayers for the janitorial and food service industries. The company is headquartered in Bridgeton, MO.
feature_bullets: Horizontal diaper changing station supports up to 250 lb. in concave shelf with safety straps for child security
When open, station measures 4 x 34-1/4 x 18 inches (Height x Width x Depth); measures 4” (Depth) when closed
Molded-in, dual liner dispensers hold approximately 50 liners for protection
Compliant with ASTM F2285 - 04(2010), ANSI Z535.3 and ANSI Z535.4

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
